channel.title: [REQ] How do I save Images onto my Memory Stick from my PSP Network? [REQ]
channel.description: How do I save Images from the Internet ie. Google onto my Memory Stick from the Internet on my PSP?

item.title: [REQ] How do I save Images onto my Memory Stick from my PSP Network? [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @rob1601 rob1601
item.description:
@rob1601 wrote:

simple connect the psp to a pc or plug your MS into the slot. Go on the internet save image as select the Psp drive will be like F: or something. Now look for a folder named PSP open it then look for IMAGES and open it. Now make a name and save it.

You may have to make your own folder as some may not have the folders, just make sure they are in capitals or it wont work

Read full topic
item.source: [REQ] How do I save Images onto my Memory Stick from my PSP Network? [REQ]
